name: Malta Order Summer
description: This is a camp only for women. Focussed on gender and systerhood creation throw different activities in a natural environment. During two weeks all the guest and helpers will enjoy sharing life experiences and workshops
address: Vanilian Bldg, 6th fl.City Rama Str. Dekwaneh

name: Humanitarian Diplomacy
description: Camp focussed on Humanitarian Diplomacy. How the diplomacy could help in humanitarian disasters and avoid the effect of that on local peole
address: Bethlehem Arab Society, P. O. Box 100, Bethlehem

name: Social Asistence Aniversary
description: This camp is focussed on the social asistence to person in a vulnerability situation due different causes. The camp will show that people how to develop their habilities and belive in themselves capacities

name: Villa Magistral Del Aventino
description: Anual act for volunteers recruitment. Includes conferences, seminars and visit to Vaticano museum.
address: Via S. Domenico, 31, 00015 Monterotondo Scalo RM, Italy

name: Interniational Law
description: Seminar about international rights focus on refugees and migrants. Climate change, wars and human rights vulnerations are pushing millions of persons to move looking for a new home, which sometimes never arrives

name: Malta Order's Origins
description: New year celebration conference. Includes some conferences about last year achievements and next year targer definitions

name: Santiago Bernabéu Stadium
description: Guided visit to Santiago Bernabeu stadium and Real Madrid Museum. Including lookedrooms, field, balcony and thropies galleries
address: Av. de Concha Espina, 1, 28036 Madrid, Spain

name: Relax In Sayulita
description: Placed in a unique environment. This camp will make you disconnect and rechargue batteries. Increase you peace levels and connect with your innerself

name: Nevado De Toluca
description: Forgot duties and connect with the nature throw trecking in the natural park Nevado de Toluca. One of the biggest protected natural parks in central america
address: Parque Nacional Nevado de Toluca, Estado de México

name: Falkensee
description: This volunteers recruitment act if focussed on craft. By the creation of craft, people with differents habilities could relax and open themselves. Also is a great way to make the helpers contact with the kid inside them

name: National Football Museum
description: Do you like football? Then, this is your best camp option. Visit with us the National Football Museum in Manchester, learn about the history of the biggest sport in Europe and share your passion with new friends
address: Urbis Building Cathedral Gardens, Todd St, Manchester M4 3BG, United Kingdom

name: Eiffel Tower
description: Middle East seminar in Paris. France history is very related with middle eastern countries because of the collonization. This camp is focussed on the emancipation and elimination of all non-horizontal links between them
address: Champ de Mars, 5 Avenue Anatole France, 75007 Paris, France

name: Cappella Dei Morti
description: This is the last conference of the year. Designed for being the sum up of previous year and also the kick off of next year

name: Trekking In Pyrenees
description: This camp is designed to ensure the relax and confort of our guests and helpers. With the trekking in Pyreness, following routes adapted for people with different habilities, you will enjoy the nature and meet new people who also love this activities
address: Carrer del Puiet 4-6 Bloc A 1er, 4ª, AD300 Ordino, Andorra
